vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to be lifted up (meaning dubious)
1a) (Hithpoel) to be lifted up, be displayed
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   vacilar, balbucear; (b) hitpo.   correr en zig-zag; (c)   resplandecer, brillar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 被高舉
1a) (Hithpoel) 被高舉, 被展示 #亞 9:16|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 被高举
1a) (Hithpoel) 被高举, 被展示 #亚 9:16|
